ComicInfo.Title: Planet of the Remakes; Mad's Celebrity Cause-Of-Death Betting Odds; In the Bartlett West Wing…/In the Bush West Wing…; Job Opportunities for the New Millennium; The Crocodile Hunter; The 25 Least Powerful People in Show Business; A Mad Look at the Navy; New Questions Based on the Stanley Kraplan SAT Prep Course; Under-Represented and Over-Represented Groups on TV; The Pet Peddler; What the Film 2001 Predicted/What the Year 2001 Actually Delivered; Monroe and… the Great American Road Trip Part Three; Spectator’s Fun Guide to Running the New York City Marathon
